officialTitle: A Randomized Trial in Intrapartum Fever Of No Antibiotics for Low-risk Women (RATIONAL)
inclusionCriteria:
* Pregnant women between 34-42 weeks gestation
* Singleton fetus
* Admitted for labor management \& develops a fever of 100.4 F or greater
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 50 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Known fetal anomaly
* Other indication for intrapartum antibiotics (endocarditis prophylaxis, other known maternal infection)
